fields.summary: Debugger: using Alloy, Android has an unexpected behavior if setting a breakpoint next to a function declaration

comments.body:
First point in the description is reproducible, the Debug window the generated "Resources/alloy/controllers/index.js" file is shown instead of the "app/controllers/index.js" file.. Not sure what's the right behaviour here.

Environment:
Appc Studio : 4.4.0.201511241829
Ti SDK :  5.1.1.GA
Ti CLI : 5.0.5
Alloy : 1.7.26
MAC Yosemite : 10.10.5
Appc NPM : 4.2.2
Appc CLI : 5.1.0
Node: v0.12.27
Nexus 6 - Android 5.1.1
